snippet: Scores of people were hurt in Yerevan, the capital, on Friday when gas-filled balloons exploded in a huge ball of flames at a campaign rally for Armenia’s Republican Party.
abstract: Scores of people are injured in Yerevan, Armenia, when gas-filled balloons explode into huge ball of flames at campaign rally for country's Republican Party ahead of parliamentary elections.
lead_paragraph: Scores of people were hurt in Yerevan, the capital, on Friday when gas-filled balloons exploded in a huge ball of flames at a campaign rally for Armenia’s Republican Party.

headline.seo: Armenia: Rally Balloons Explode At Campaign Rally
